ARGUMENT
t

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( t = T -> ( normop ` t ) = ( normop ` T ) ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_breq1d | |- ( t = T -> ( ( normop ` t ) < +oo <-> ( normop ` T ) < +oo ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_df-bdop | |- BndLinOp = { t e. LinOp | ( normop ` t ) < +oo } |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_elrab2 | |- ( T e. BndLinOp <-> ( T e. LinOp /\ ( normop ` T ) < +oo ) ) |
